title: King's dream: It's all about us
text: Imagining how King would view things in the Puget Sound region is an exercise filled with possibilities.

title: One teacher's approach
text: To Brenda Jackson, King's message isn't just for the holiday.

title: Black, white and together
text: Bellevue and Central Area congregations are now fast friends.

title: Raising up one of us raises up all of us
text: The movement was about more than getting a seat in a restaurant; it was about making America truer to its best self.

title: King, civil-rights movement moved by faith
text: Let's not forget King was a man of religion.

title: Black activism today: more personal, subtle
text: "We as a young generation haven't taken up civil rights because we see it as only part of the pie," says Seattle hip-hop artist Adonis Williams.

title: An opportunity to talk about race
text: When it comes to talking about race, many of us don't do a very good job.
